Pastor’s Viral Rebuke of the American Church
In a short video posted to X, Pastor Greg Locke rebuked the state of the American church. He also spoke about the backlash Christians have given Pastor Paula White for assuming leadership of the newly assembled Faith Office, which was created by President Donald Trump.
